thread.title: Brad Hall Reveals the Top 5 Sneakers That Are Hardest to Put On
thread.title_full: Brad Hall Reveals the Top 5 Sneakers That Are Hardest to Put On

author: Daniel Pearson
title: Brad Hall Reveals the Top 5 Sneakers That Are Hardest to Put On
text:
Nerdy sneaker specialist Brad Hall is back again with a fresh video — and this time he reveals his top five hardest-to-put-on sneakers.
In his usual hilarious and charming deadpan style, Hall explains why he loves shoes and sneakers that are hard to put on. “Even though all these shoes are really hard to put on, that doesn’t mean I don’t love them,” he says. “If anything, I love these shoes even more. Getting these shoes on is difficult, and that makes it so satisfying.”
The list, which follows his previous “Top 5 Easiest To put on Sneakers” video (see below) from last month, includes the Nike SF Air Force 1, Nike Foamposite One, Nike LeBron 14, a dress shoe by Florsheim (lol,) and the adidas YEEZY Boost 750.
Check out the video above, then watch a selection of his previous reviews below.



In other sneaker news, watch Rowan Zorilla skate in the Supreme x Vans Leopard Sk8-Mid Pro .
